blurs.$description: Blur tokens for creating depth and focus effects

sm.$description: Subtle blur effect for small UI elements

base.$description: Default blur amount for general use

md.$description: Medium blur for moderate depth effects

xl.$description: Extra large blur for significant depth

2xl.$description: Very strong blur effect for maximum depth

3xl.$description: Maximum blur for extreme depth effects

md.$description: Medium breakpoint for tablets and small desktops

lg.$description: Large breakpoint for large desktops and wide screens

xl.$description: Extra large breakpoint for large screens and wide displays

2xl.$description: 2x large breakpoint for very large screens and displays

durations.$description: Duration tokens for controlling animation timing

extraLong.$description: Extra long duration for very slow feedback

easings.$description: Easing tokens for controlling animation smoothness

easeInOut.$description: Ease in and out for balanced feedback

fonts.$description: Font family tokens for controlling text font

fontSizes.$description: Starting font size tokens for controlling text size. Defaults to responsive values.

bpsm.$description: Font size scale for small screens

bpmd.$description: Font size scale for medium sized screens

bplg.$description: Font size scale for large sized screens

fontWeights.$description: Font weight tokens for controlling text weight

letterSpacings.$description: Letter spacing tokens for controlling text spacing

lineHeights.$description: Line height tokens for controlling text height

radii.$description: Border radius tokens for controlling corner roundness

none.$description: No border radius, creates sharp corners

025.$description: Extra small border radius for subtle rounding

050.$description: Small border radius for light rounding

075.$description: Medium border radius for balanced rounding

100.$description: Large border radius for prominent rounding

150.$description: Extra large border radius for significant rounding

200.$description: Very large border radius for prominent curved corners

300.$description: Extremely large border radius for dramatic rounding

400.$description: Maximum border radius for pill-like shapes

round.$description: Rounds all corners to a circle
